Uses of Package
org.cloudbus.cloudsim.power

  • Packages that use org.cloudbus.cloudsim.power 
    Package Description
    org.cloudbus.cloudsim.examples.power  
    org.cloudbus.cloudsim.examples.storage  
    org.cloudbus.cloudsim.power  
  • Classes in org.cloudbus.cloudsim.power used by org.cloudbus.cloudsim.examples.power 
    Class and Description
    PowerDatacenter
    PowerDatacenter is a class that enables simulation of power-aware data centers.
    PowerHost
    PowerHost class enables simulation of power-aware hosts.
    PowerVmAllocationPolicyMigrationAbstract
    The class of an abstract power-aware VM allocation policy that dynamically optimizes the VM allocation using migration.
    PowerVmSelectionPolicy
    The class of an abstract VM selection policy.
  • Classes in org.cloudbus.cloudsim.power used by org.cloudbus.cloudsim.examples.storage 
    Class and Description
    MyPowerDatacenter
    My Power-aware Datacenter is a Datacenter which overwrites all methods to be in accordance with power-aware ability.
    MyPowerDatacenterBroker
    My Broker used for storage examples.
    MyPowerHarddriveStorage
    MyPowerHarddriveStorage enables simulation of power-aware Hard drives.
    PowerHost
    PowerHost class enables simulation of power-aware hosts.
    PowerVm
    The class of a VM that stores its CPU utilization history.
  • Classes in org.cloudbus.cloudsim.power used by org.cloudbus.cloudsim.power 
    Class and Description
    MyPowerHarddriveStorage
    MyPowerHarddriveStorage enables simulation of power-aware Hard drives.
    PowerDatacenter
    PowerDatacenter is a class that enables simulation of power-aware data centers.
    PowerDatacenterBroker
    A broker for the power package.
    PowerHost
    PowerHost class enables simulation of power-aware hosts.
    PowerHostUtilizationHistory
    The class of a host that stores its CPU utilization history.
    PowerVm
    The class of a VM that stores its CPU utilization history.
    PowerVmAllocationPolicyAbstract
    The class of an abstract power-aware VM allocation policy.
    PowerVmAllocationPolicyMigrationAbstract
    The class of an abstract power-aware VM allocation policy that dynamically optimizes the VM allocation using migration.
    PowerVmAllocationPolicyMigrationLocalRegression
    The Local Regression (LR) VM allocation policy.
    PowerVmSelectionPolicy
    The class of an abstract VM selection policy.
